description:
This is an opportunity for everybody involved in the second round of our mentorship programme to meet up in person.

We will give an introduction to the programme followed by a discussion where you will be able to ask questions and make suggestions.

Unfortunately we cannot accept any more mentees. However, if you would like to be a mentor, please fill out the Mentor questionnaire (https://goo.gl/forms/ITATZCQiDCcIqp8n1) or contact Mark or Katja on our Slack board.
title: Mentorship Kickoff
